sentences.en: But Lenovo owes its success more to retailing acumen than technological virtuosity.

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: Enthrall me with your acumen.

sentences.en: He had demonstrated considerable business acumen.

sentences.en: Her business acumen has made her very successful.

sentences.en: His business acumen brought him riches in a short time.

sentences.en: His business acumen helped him to succeed where others had failed.

sentences.en: His sharp business acumen meant he quickly rose to the top.

sentences.en: The Microsoft monopoly was one part luck, one part acumen.
sentences.cn: 微软之所以能垄断市场,一部分靠运气, 一部分靠机智.
